subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nathan Horton, the star for Boston in Game 7 of the conference finals, would have awarded the jacket to the M.V.P. of Monday’s win, but he was hospitalized with a severe concussion.
snippet: Nathan Horton, the star for Boston in Game 7 of the conference finals, would have awarded the jacket to the M.V.P. of Monday’s win, but he was hospitalized with a severe concussion.
